subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Robert Karlsson of Sweden won the Alfred Dunhill Links Championship with a birdie on the first hole of a three-man playoff in St. Andrews, Scotland. Karlsson and Ross Fisher had seven-under 65s, and the overnight leader, Martin Kaymer, shot a 68 to tie the others at 10-under 278.
